name: Size Is Difficult
description:
Resizing is the key to completing the puzzles !

72 HOURS...

This game was made in 3 days for MashUp Game Jam. Theme was... Size Matters

WHERE YOU CAN SUPORT ME?

You can support me with subscribe on my YouTube chanel, or with follow on my Twitter, or you can visit my websites. You can donate me too!

CONTROLS
  • A, D - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • R - Restart level
  • ESC - Back to menu
HOW TO DOWNLOAD
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on  SizeIsDifficult.exe
